record.field: Block A-3, Sector 15, Cyber City, DLF Phase 2, Gurugram, Haryana 122002

High-priority enterprise client seeking comprehensive ERP solution for 500+ employee organization. Annual revenue $10M+. Immediate implementation required. Budget pre-approved $500K. Decision maker directly involved. Previous successful implementations with SAP and Oracle. Strong technical team in place. Quarterly review meetings scheduled. Multi-location deployment across 5 cities. Integration with existing CRM and financial systems required. Timeline: 6 months. ROI expected within 18 months.
Medical Complex, AIIMS Road, Ansari Nagar, New Delhi 110029

Leading healthcare provider with 15 hospitals nationwide seeking advanced HMS solution. Current system end-of-life in 3 months. Budget allocated $2M for digital transformation. NABH accreditation compliance required. Integration with lab systems, pharmacy, and billing modules essential. 24/7 support needed. Staff training for 1000+ users. Government tender process initiated. Technical evaluation in progress. Proof of concept completed successfully. References from similar healthcare implementations verified.
Plot No. 156, Industrial Area Phase 1, Chandigarh 160002

ISO 9001 certified manufacturing company with 25-year track record seeking Industry 4.0 transformation. Production capacity 10,000 units/month. Export to 15+ countries. Current manual processes causing 15% efficiency loss. Board approval secured for $750K investment. Pilot project successful at Mumbai facility. Rollout planned across 4 manufacturing plants. Integration with existing MES and quality control systems. Real-time dashboard requirements. Vendor evaluation phase - shortlisted to final 3 suppliers. Implementation timeline: 8 months.
